title: tuNai ninru
sahitya:
tuNai ninru enai inrE aNaindaruL murugA


anupallavi

  taNi kaittalam Ongi dharaNiyOrait-tAngi iNaiyillA sIrOngum IrAru karattOnE


caraNam    sharaNam enru undan sannidhi tanait- tEDi varuvOrkkellAm uru tuNai purivOnE
aravaNaitt-ennaiyum avvidham AtkoNDu allaluTru evvidham tollaiyum urAmal
